root.message: The FREQ_COLL field for indicator 9-5-2, translated into en
root.data: The UNESCO Institute for Statistics (UIS) sends out the questionnaire in June every year. The Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD) and the Statistical Office of the European Union (Eurostat) collect data twice per year. The Network on Science and Technology Indicators – Ibero-American and Inter-American (RICYT) collects data once per year.
